_sText:
**NOTE: I've updated this version, please redownload to make sure its fully debugged**

This is not my map, I only optimized & debugged it.

The original author can be found [here](http://gamebanana.com/members/1289716 "")

The reason why I fixed it because on the release on Gamebanana all the ladders didn't work and jumping rope was really killing quite alot of people when turned off.
I didn't edit any structures or secrets, only thing I edited is the ball.

All of this is fixed.

Includes 

- Disco 
- Moving floor 
- Obstacle course 
- Soccer
- Maze 
- Race 
- Chair game 
- Pool
- Many secrets 
- Easy map to command on
- And many other things
